byline: Stan Alcorn, Noel King, Jim Burress and David Brancaccio
description: Airing on Wednesday, December 31, 2014: First up, a Chinese court takes a stand against pollution. And we'll also look ahead to climate policy in 2015. Plus, American Apparel is cutting hours and laying off workers at some of its factories "to conserve funds." We look at what’s behind the move and what the implications are for the company.
